entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. High 13. POP 40%

entry.title: Thursday night: Overcast. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: Overcast. 40 percent chance of showers near Boston Bar. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late this evening. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PDT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of showers. High 8. POP 60%
